name: Festival Run!
description:
By collecting the flags on the way, reach the crowd waiting for you at the end so that you can multiply the festival enthusiasm.

Don't let the obstacles on the road stop you! Collect as many flags as you can, fly through gaps with your parachute and be careful about your balance.

Have a nice trip!
publishers: PB BILISIM TEKNOLOJI YAZILIM SAGLIK HIZMETLERI VE DANISMANLIK LIMITED SIRKETI
